page.title: 11CROFT C.of E. SCHOOL.
page.content: Croft Primary School was transfered to the new building in 1975. There are about 65 children on roll,who come from Croft, Dalton, Eryholme and Over- Dinsdale. Some children from outside the area also have permission to come to this school. There is a headteacher, two assistant teachers and a part-time teacher for nine hours a week. There is also help with clerical work for 10 hours each week. A caretaker,a cook and helper and two supervisory assistants for school lunches make up the staff. The extra-curricular activities include sports and music clubs which meet at lunch times and after school. The pupils take part in inter-school activities, go out on educational outings and have visitors into school to talk and demonstrate a variety of subjects.
